alert.note: Alert for Freestone (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 26 at 10:27AM CDT until October 28 at 2:38AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Freestone county in North Texas. * WHEN...Until 1230 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will likely cause urban and small stream flooding. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Teague, Fairfield, Wortham, Fairfield Lake State Park, Fairfield Lake, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Streetman, Kirvin, Stewards Mill, Cotton Gin, Freestone and Donie.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
